column2: Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.
Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death, wrapped in blackened\\nsteel to protect the bones underneath.
Bone steeds pull dreaded chariots made from thick steel, impacting enemy lines with bone-shattering force and grinding all beneath their heavy wheels.

Through the actions of Traitor Kings, the forces of Nagash have access to Warsphinxes.
